@Midnight AristocratI just watched a shrink online explain narcs... fascinating.  You are not made a narc you are born one (nature/nurture). Narcs want the power/money and have a need for attention (cause as a baby lacking empathy they didn't get love) they feel a sense of power when they get attention..they are hollow and need others to buy into their fake personality they will change over and over again. The way a narc is broken are the skills and lifestyle needed to be an actor. No wonder many narcs wanna be actors. And most actors are narcs.
I think that's why johnny had trouble handling his fame. He never desired to be a famous actor nor does he feel the desire for power/fame/money. He had a narc mom and grew up performing for her attention...but johnny has empathy and isn't a narc. But his upbringing gave him the skillset narcs would have. It made him good at his job but it hurts him cause he has empathy/feelings. Also when a narc loses control they act out...get  violent...like a toddler temper tantrum. But look at johnny on that tape hitting cabinets. Yes he wasn't taught to control his anger when he is out of control...narc mom....BUT he chooses to direct his anger onto cabinets cause johnny has empathy and wouldn't harm another living person. The "if he hits cabinets he hits people" argument is bullsh!t.
 Yes johnny is clearly the child of a narc and has his issues....but he isn't one himself...and an abuser is not one of his issues. He just made the mistake of marrying a woman like his mom. I really really think johnny is 100% innocent. 
I am a firm believer that everything happens for a reason in life. Being married to amber...being forced to research her mental health problems in order to realise amber was never real. It FORCED johnny to change for the better....he was repeating his childhood but this time with the mind of an adult. And now johnny has had enough and the kind guy who wouldn't hurt a fly is defending himself and suing the sun/amber. They crossed his bounderies and he is calmly defending himself. Good for him.üí™üëçHe isn't suing for money or attention like amber at the trial....no johnny is making a point, standing up for himself and getting closure.üëç  I hope that will help him with his addiction as well..if the source of that was in his childhood this can only help him with that. Take it from me, sometimes narcs come into your life...yes to burn your life down...but so you can rebuild it better. I hope johnny wins both cases and amber and her co-conspirators do some hard time.
